commit message: * Changed decimal separator in size, uplaod speed, download speed, etc., from colon to period.
* Fixed typos in Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese and Brazilian translations
* Added total size in each item of the torrent list
* Changed 'qBittorrent Controller Pro' for 'qBittorrent Controller' in the Swedish translation [free version]
* Fixed 'Downloaded / Size' in torrent detail update
* Added support for opening downloaded .torrent files from 'Downloads'
* Added support for opening downloaded .torrent files from 'Downloads'
* Fixed wrong behavior after choosing Settings, Get Pro, Help items

Release 4.1.6

* Added support for opening downloaded .torrent files from 'Downloads'
* Added 'Downloaded / Size' in torrent list and details
* Changed decimal separator to period in sizes, upload  and download speed
* Fixed wrong behavior after choosing Settings, Get Pro, Help items
* Fixed  Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Swedish translations
